entries.name: Fire Giant

traits.name: Lava Strike
traits.effect: Searing blow crashes into the target, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Molten Hide
traits.effect: Blazing hide sears weapons, dulling harm.

traits.name: Bone Breaker
traits.effect: Cripples enemies with crushing blows, dealing heavy damage and stunning them for two turns.

entries.description: Ancient titanic warriors infused with the Plane of Fire’s essence.

entries.name: Frost Giant

traits.name: Frost Nova
traits.effect: Freezes foes briefly.

traits.name: Grave Tempest
traits.effect: A roar that spills hoarfrost and bone splinters across the field.

traits.name: Avalanche Strike
traits.effect: Can Stagger multiple foes when fighting on slopes.

entries.description: Titanic giants wrought from glacial stone and bound to the cold north.

entries.name: Stone Giant

traits.name: Boulder Toss
traits.effect: Throws a hewn stone from range, dealing damage.

traits.name: Bedrock Body
traits.effect: Stone plates interlock, reducing incoming harm.

traits.name: Thunderclap
traits.effect: A colossal impact stuns the target briefly.

entries.description: Massive titanic guardians of mountains and valleys, shaped from rock itself.

entries.name: Mountain Giant

traits.name: Boulder Toss
traits.effect: Throws a hewn stone from range, dealing damage.

traits.name: Tree-Trunk Swing
traits.effect: A sweeping blow that shatters guard.

traits.name: Dual Smash
traits.effect: Both clubs sweep wide, damaging nearby foes.

entries.description: The largest of the stone giants, towering like mountains themselves.

entries.name: Ice Giant

traits.name: Frost Nova
traits.effect: Freezes foes briefly.

traits.name: Icicle Spear
traits.effect: A launched ice spear that punctures through both heavy and light armor.

traits.name: Chill of the Grave
traits.effect: Cold touch that saps warmth and slows the body.

entries.description: Colossal beings of frozen tundra, kin to frost giants but more primal.

entries.name: Sea Giant

traits.name: Tidal Coil
traits.effect: Yanks a target toward the user.

traits.name: Command of the Deep
traits.effect: Nearby gilgoblins and Kvaldir fight with renewed fury.

traits.name: Anchor Smash
traits.effect: Brings down a rusted anchor with crushing force, Knocking Down enemies and dealing instant damage.

entries.description: Mariners of the deep seas; massive, barnacled titans who stride from surf to war.

entries.name: Storm Giant

traits.name: Thunderclap
traits.effect: A colossal impact stuns the target briefly.

traits.name: Storm Aura
traits.effect: Static drag slows the target’s steps.

traits.name: Stormcall
traits.effect: Summons a lightning storm over a target, striking up to three enemies each turn on successful rolls.

entries.description: Immense titanic beings wreathed in lightning, heralds of titanic wrath.

entries.name: Iron Giant

traits.name: Clearing the Lane
traits.effect: Shatters fortifications with a shaped blast, injuring anyone standing along the path.

traits.name: Adamant Frame
traits.effect: Massive plating shrugs off punishing strikes, preventing puncturing hits like Aimed Shot.

traits.name: Wardbreaker
traits.effect: Disrupts magical barriers.

entries.description: Colossi of living iron, forged to guard titanic vaults and sanctums.

entries.name: Anubisath Giant

traits.name: Sandstorm
traits.effect: Summons a blistering storm of sand that damages and blinds any enemies in the area.

traits.name: Obelisk Ward
traits.effect: Raises a runic ward that dulls volleys.

traits.name: Hyena Pack
traits.effect: Summons or commands desert hyenas for support.

entries.description: Jackal-headed stone giants forged by titans to guard desert ruins.

entries.name: Titan Watcher

traits.name: Condemn
traits.effect: Weakens a foe with holy judgment.

traits.name: Wardstone Core
traits.effect: Raises defenses or maximum health temporarily.

traits.name: Blazing Strike
traits.effect: Smashes enemies with fiery weapons, dealing instant damage and leaving Burning damage.

traits.name: Arcane Bolt
traits.effect: Strikes enemies with a more precise bolt raw arcane power with a +1 to hit chance.

entries.description: Titan-forged watchers tasked with overseeing ancient sites and enforcing order.

entries.name: Gronn

traits.name: Crushing Grip
traits.effect: Grasps with primal force, dealing direct damage and trapping the target.

traits.name: Bone Breaker
traits.effect: Cripples enemies with crushing blows, dealing heavy damage and stunning them for two turns.

traits.name: Gnaw
traits.effect: Inflicts damage that persists for several rounds.

traits.name: Tree-Trunk Swing
traits.effect: A sweeping blow that shatters guard.

entries.description: Massive one-eyed giants native to Draenor, brutish but cunning, often ruling ogres and ogron.

entries.name: Magnaron

traits.name: Magma Crash
traits.effect: Ember-heat or stone shards harm the target over time.

traits.name: Unstoppable Rage
traits.effect: Ignores effects that would slow them.

traits.name: Boulder Toss
traits.effect: Throws a hewn stone from range, dealing damage.

entries.description: Elementally charged progenitors of gronn, massive stone-skinned titans infused with molten fury.

entries.name: Ogron

traits.name: Club Sweep
traits.effect: Swings a mighty club at enemies, damaging nearby targets.

traits.name: Thick-Skulled
traits.effect: Reflects damage back onto the attacker.

entries.description: Smaller cousins of the gronn, brutish servants and warriors who often lead ogre warbands.

entries.name: Colossus

traits.name: Club Bash
traits.effect: Heavy strike with a crude club.

traits.name: Stout Resilience
traits.effect: Resists morale loss slightly.

entries.description: Towering titans of Draenor, larger even than gronn or magnaron, whose presence dominates battlefields.

entries.name: Molten Giant

traits.name: Flame Lash
traits.effect: Sears the target with a burning strike, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Molten Hide
traits.effect: Blazing hide sears weapons, dulling harm.

traits.name: Hellfire
traits.effect: Summons a devastating rain of fire from the skies above.

entries.description: Titans of flame and stone birthed from Ragnaros’s domain.

entries.name: Fungal Giant

traits.name: Spore Cloud
traits.effect: Creates a lasting damaging zone on the ground.

traits.name: Regrowth
traits.effect: Heals an ally for 6 health points, but takes two turns to cast.

traits.name: Elemental Grasp
traits.effect: Elemental hands seize multiple targets in place, preventing movement.

entries.description: Towering myconid-like giants that stride through marsh and jungle.

entries.name: Gemstone Colossus

traits.name: Prism Beam
traits.effect: Fires a cutting ray through enemies in a line.

traits.name: Crystal Shard
traits.effect: Launches empowered crystal fragments.

traits.name: Mana Barrier
traits.effect: Protects themselves with energy shield.

entries.description: Shimmering crystalline giants, forged of earth’s deepest veins.

entries.name: Flesh Giant

traits.name: Gore Hook
traits.effect: Snags and drags prey into crushing reach.

traits.name: Gore-Plated Bulk
traits.effect: Grotesque mass shrugs off lesser blows.

entries.description: Undead titans stitched together by necromancers, used as siege monstrosities.

entries.name: Clockwork Giant

traits.name: Steam Slam
traits.effect: Vents steam in a burst, damaging nearby foes.

traits.name: Gearframe
traits.effect: Improvised melee attack with tools.

entries.description: Titan-forged constructs of cogs and gears; half-giant, half-machine.

entries.name: Ettin

traits.name: Dual Smash
traits.effect: Both clubs sweep wide, damaging nearby foes.

traits.name: Boulder Toss
traits.effect: Throws a hewn stone from range, dealing damage.

traits.name: Tree-Trunk Swing
traits.effect: A sweeping blow that shatters guard.

entries.description: Primitive two-headed giants, brutish but unpredictable.

entries.name: Djaradin

traits.name: Flameforged Strike
traits.effect: Damages up to two adjacent targets in a melee arc.

traits.name: Dragon Tamer
traits.effect: Commands enslaved drakes.

entries.description: Dragon Isles giants who live to war against dragons and their kin.

entries.name: Magnataur

traits.name: Tusk Gore
traits.effect: Brutal gore attack that disrupts foe.

traits.name: Quake Stomp
traits.effect: Shakes the ground to stagger enemies.

traits.name: Antler Charge
traits.effect: Charge at the enemy, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit.

entries.description: Half-giant taurens of the frozen north, savage and cruel.

entries.name: Genesaur

traits.name: Verdant Call
traits.effect: Summons a minor nature elemental to the field.

traits.name: Nature Surge
traits.effect: Vines seize the target, preventing movement.

traits.name: Antler Charge
traits.effect: Charge at the enemy, gaining +1 damage upon successful hit.

entries.description: Dinosaur-like plant giants, children of nature’s primal power.
